gurmukhi: Cim iesxI Sbdwid aucwro ]mQxI Sbd AMq iqh fwro ]nwm qupk ky sB lih lIjY ]sdw sunq buiD jnn BxIjY ]1160]
transliteration: Chham(i) Isanishabadaadh Oucdaro|| Mathanishabad Ant Tih Daro|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Lah(i) Leejai|| Sadaa Sounat Budh(i) Janan Bhaneejai||1160||
translation: Saying the word “Kshmeshani”, add the word “mathani” and know the names of Tupak for causing the wise men to listen to them.1160.

gurmukhi: DrqIsix Awid bKwn ]Air SBd AMq pRmwn ]sB cIn nwm quPMg ]sB Tvr Bnhu inSMg ]1161]
transliteration: Dharteesan(i) Aadh Bakhaan|| Ar(i) Shabad Ant Pramaan|| Sabh Cheen Naam Touphan|| Sabh Thavar Bhanoh Nishan||1161||
translation: Saying the word “Dharneeshani”, add the word “ari” at the end and recognize the names of Tupak.1161.

gurmukhi: Dvl DirsxI pd ko piRQm aucwrIAY ]ArxI qwky AMq Sbd ko fwrIAY ]Aimq qupk ky nwm cqur lih lIjIAY ]ho skl bu`iD jn sunq aucwrn kIjIAY ]1162]
transliteration: Dhaval Dharisanipad Ko Pritham Oucdareeai|| Arnitaake Ant Shabad Ko Dareeai|| Amit Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Lah(i) Leejeeai|| Ho Sakal Buddh(i) Jan Sounat Ouchaaran Keejeeai||1162||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Dhaval-Dhareeshani”, add the word “arini” at the end and know cleverly the innumerable names of Tupak.1162.

gurmukhi: biRKB DirsxI Awid bKwno ]Air pd AMq qvn ky Twno ]nwm qupk ky sB lih il`jY ]skl sBw ky suxq Bix`jY ]1163]
transliteration: Brikhabh Dhar(i)saniaadh Bakhaano|| Ar(i) Pad Ant Tavan Ke Thaano|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Lah(i) Lijjai|| Sakal Sabhaa Ke Sounat Bhanijjai||1163||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Vrashabh-Dhareeshani”, add the word “ari” at the end and know all the names of Tupak.1163.

gurmukhi: DwvlysxI Awid bKwno ]mQxI Sbd AMq iqh Twno ]nwm qupk ky skl pCwnIAY ]skl bu`D jn sunq bKwnIAY ]1164]
transliteration: Dhaavlesaniaadh Bakhaano|| Mathanishabad Ant Tih Thaano|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Pachhaadeeai|| Sakal Buddh Jan Sounat Bakhaaneeai||1164||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Dhaavleshani”, add the word “mathani” at the end and know all the names of Tupak.1164.

gurmukhi: Awid DvliesxI Sbdwid bKwnIAY ]qwky ArxI AMq Sbd ko TwnIAY ]skl qupk ky nwm cqur lih lIjIAY ]ho gunIjnn kI sBw aucwrn kIjIAY ]1165]
transliteration: Aadh Dhaval-isanishabadaadh Bakhaaneeai|| Taake Arniant Shabad Ko Thaaneeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Lah(i) Leejeeai|| Ho Gouneejanan Kisabhaa Ouchaaran Keejeeai||1165||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Dhaval-ishani”, add the word “arini” at the end and know all the names of Tupak for pronouncing before the talented persons.1165.

gurmukhi: piRQm biRKBxI iesxI Sbd aucwrIAY ]mQxI qwky AMq Sbd ko fwrIAY ]skl qupk ky nwm cIn lY cqur icq ]ho kwib kQw mY dIjY Aau BIqr kibq ]1166]
transliteration: Pritham Brikhbhaniisanishabad Oucdareeai|| Mathanitaake Ant Shabad Kodareeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Cheen Lai Chatur Chit|| Ho Kaah(i) Kathaa Mai Deejai Au Bheetar Kabit||1166||
translation: Saying the word “Vrashabhani-Ishani”, add the word “mathani” at the end and know all names of Tupak in your mind1166.

gurmukhi: gwivsiesxI Sbdih Awid aucwrIAY ]ArxI qwky AMq Sbd ko fwrIAY ]skl qupk ky nwm suGr lih lIjIAih ]ho kibq kwb ky bIc infr huie dIjIAih ]1167]
transliteration: Gadvis-isanishabadaadh Aadh Oucdareeai|| Arnitaake Ant Shabad Ko Dareeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Soughar Lah(i) Leejeeah(i)|| Ho Kabit Kaab Ke Beech Nidar Hue Deejeeah(i)||1167||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Gaavis-Ishani”, add the word “arini” at the end and know the names of Tupak for using them in potry.1167.

gurmukhi: BUivsxI pd piRQm aucwrn kIjIAY ]mQxI qwky AMq Sbd khu dIjIAY ]skl qupk ky nwm jwn jIX lIjIAY ]ho jvn Tvr mY chIAY qh qy dIjIAY ]1168]
transliteration: Bhoovisanipad Pritham Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Mathanitaake Ant Shabad Kauh Deejeeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Jaan Jeea Leejeeai|| Ho Javan Thavar Mai Chaheeai Tah Te Deejeeai||1168||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Bhoomishani”, add the word “mathani” at the end and know all the names of Tupak for using as desired.1168.
